column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The decor of this establishment was top-notch
column2: and my wife and I felt that our money was well spent.  Although the interior was somewhat upscale and well done
column4: and we felt quite comfortable in our very casual attire.  The staff was kind and attentive.  It is in a classy part of town
column5: and attached to a free parking garage. (free.. now there's a shocker)  Since we're moving to Orlando soon
column6: we may never have a chance to eat here again
column7: but if we are ever in Houston again
column8: I guarantee we'll be eating at this place.
